io.goobi.viewer.model.translations.admin

Class TranslationGroupItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.model.translations.admin.TranslationGroupItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessagesTranslationGroupItem, SolrFieldNameTranslationGroupItem, SolrFieldValueTranslationGroupItem

    public abstract class TranslationGroupItem
extends Object
    A single element as part of a translation group.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected List<MessageEntry> entries 
      protected String key
      A single message key or a regular expression for multiple message keys.
      protected boolean regex
      If true, key will contain a regular expression.

      • loadEntries

        protected abstract void loadEntries()
                             throws Exception
        Populates the message key map by first loading the appropriate keys and then calling createMessageKeyStatusMap. Each subclass will have its specific data source, so each subclass must implement this method.
        Throws:
        Exception
